attributes.action: introduce legislation to remove section 2, 2 (c) from the Charities Act 2006.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As religion is responsible for so much evil in the history of the world, and given that we are currently undergoing a massive financial crunch, it is obnoxious that religions should be recognised as satisfying the "public benefit" test of the Charities Act and at the same time, that their exclusionary and prejudiced activities be subsidised by the public purse through tax exemptions. Religious organisations should immediately be required to pay taxes as any other special interest group.
